The dose escalation portion study include approximately 30 subject . Once recommended phase two dose schedule determine , 20 additional subject enrol expanded safety portion study . Subjects meet criterion CR , CRi , MRD-negative PR study may discontinue ABT 199 . If disease progression occur , define iwCLL NCI/WG criterion tumor response , subject may re-initiate ABT-199 .
